name: Meeting: Sprint-3 Planning
observations: Attendees: Product Owner, Tech Lead, Dev A, Dev B, Dev C, Scrum Master
Agenda: Review sprint goal, Story grooming, Task breakdown, Capacity planning

name: Decision: OAuth Library Choice
observations: Topic: Which OAuth library to use?
Options Considered: passport-google-oauth20, googleapis, custom implementation
Rationale: Most popular, well-documented, active maintenance, team familiarity

name: Decision: Password Policy
observations: Options Considered: NIST guidelines (length only), Traditional (complex), Passphrase
Decision: Traditional - Min 8 chars, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 special
Rationale: Compliance requirement from security team

name: ActionItem: Setup OAuth Project
observations: Description: Create Google Cloud project and get OAuth credentials
Notes: Credentials stored in secrets manager

name: ActionItem: Security Checklist
observations: Description: Create security checklist for auth implementation
Notes: Using OWASP ASVS as base

name: ActionItem: Staging Environment
observations: Description: Prepare staging environment for OAuth testing

name: Meeting: Sprint-3 Retrospective
observations: PrepWork: Team fills Miro board before meeting

name: Meeting: Tech Sync - OAuth Deep Dive
observations: Attendees: Dev A (presenter), Dev B, Dev C
Purpose: Knowledge sharing to reduce key person dependency
Agenda: OAuth 2.0 flow, Implementation walkthrough, Q&A, Hands-on exercise
Materials: Slides, Code samples, Sandbox environment

name: Meeting: Stakeholder Demo
observations: Attendees: Product Owner, VP Engineering, Backend Squad, QA Lead
DemoItems: Google OAuth login, Email/Password login, Password reset flow
PrepWork: Test all demo scenarios 1 day before

from: Meeting: Tech Sync - OAuth Deep Dive
Meeting: Tech Sync - OAuth Deep Dive
